keyMoments.title: Zoro Demonstrates Overwhelming Power
keyMoments.description: Zoro showcases the Straw Hats' growth in the New World by using his Ittoryu: Daishinkan technique to defeat Monet.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's increased power level after the time skip.

keyMoments.title: Crew Members Aid Mocha and Children
keyMoments.description: Chopper, Nami, and Robin work together to help Mocha protect the children from the deadly candy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's compassion and commitment to saving innocent victims.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Escapes Garbage Disposal
keyMoments.description: Luffy climbs out of the garbage chute while carrying Momonosuke.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's determination and protective instincts.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Tashigi Defeats Monet
keyMoments.description: Captain Tashigi of the G-5 Marines defeats the Logia user Monet with her Kiri Shigure technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strength and capability of G-5 officers in the New World.

keyMoments.title: Marines Fight Alongside Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Tashigi fights alongside Zoro against a common enemy despite their opposing factions.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the temporary alliance between Marines and Pirates on Punk Hazard.

keyMoments.title: Monet's Defeat
keyMoments.description: Donquixote Pirates member Monet is defeated by Tashigi in the Biscuit Room.
keyMoments.significance: Represents a setback for the Donquixote Pirates' operations on Punk Hazard.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with sunglasses and a smiley face
